channel.title: Supervision on C'est la Z
channel.description: Recent content in Supervision on C'est la Z

item.title: Observing CS Teachers
item.description: Another set of tweets god me thinking: How do we help school administrators help and evaluate CS teachers? asks @lsudol of @CSForAll #csta2017 Many don't understand CS — Alfred Thompson (@alfredtwo) July 10, 2017 If the current system is any indication, checklists are not the answer — Mike Zamansky (@zamansky) July 15, 2017 I get the intent. CS teachers should be evaluated by people who have some clue about the subject.
